tables.name: grocery_sales
tables.description: Sales transactions data for a grocery store chain

columns.name: unit_price
columns.description: Price per unit of the product after discount

columns.name: quantity_returned
columns.description: Number of units returned by the customer

columns.name: discount_percentage
columns.description: Discount percentage applied to the product

columns.name: revenue
columns.description: Total revenue from the product (unit_price * final_quantity)

columns.name: branch_city
columns.description: City where the branch is located

columns.name: branch_region
columns.description: Region where the branch is located

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the employee who processed the transaction

columns.name: payment_method
columns.description: Method of payment used for the transaction

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer (NULL for non-member customers)

columns.name: customer_name
columns.description: Name of the customer (NULL for non-member customers)
